00025 class SeqBlockMetadataType {
00026  public:
00027    SeqBlockMetadataType(std::string type);
00028    SeqBlockMetadataType(char type[5]);
00029    bool operator==(SeqBlockMetadataType& other);
00030    std::string typeStr;
00031 };
00032 
00033 /// Encapsulates the metadata format used by SeqBlocks that are written to disk
00034 class SeqBlockMetadata {
00035  public:
00036    SeqBlockMetadata();
00037    SeqBlockMetadata(char *data, int len);
00038 
00039    ~SeqBlockMetadata();
00040 
00041    // the data will be given back to you in this endianness.  if your data
00042    // is endian-dependent, you must either store the endianness, or
00043    // (more advisably) store it in host-endian format and convert when
00044    // you read if IsNativeEndian() returns false
00045    void AddSection(SeqBlockMetadataType type, char *data, int len);
00046 
00047    bool HasSection(SeqBlockMetadataType type);
00048 
00049    // if IsNativeEndian() is false, you will probably need to byte-swap
00050    // any data you read
00051    char *GetSectionData(SeqBlockMetadataType type);
00052    int GetSectionLen(SeqBlockMetadataType type);
00053 
00054    int GetPackedLen(); // in bytes
00055    void GetPackedData(char *outData);
00056 
00057    bool IsNativeEndian() { return mNativeEndian; }
00058 
00059  private:
00060    struct section {
00061       section(SeqBlockMetadataType _type, int _len, char *_data):
00062          type(_type),len(_len),data(_data)
00063       { }
00064       SeqBlockMetadataType type;
00065       int len;
00066       char *data;
00067    };
00068    std::vector<section> mSections;
00069    bool mNativeEndian;
00070 };
00071 
00072 class SeqBlockSummary {
00073  public:
00074    /// Create summary data given uncompressed samples.
00075    SeqBlockSummary(Buffer samples);
00076 
00077    /// Create from packed summary data that had been previously
00078    /// saved from GetPackedData.  Also needs to know the number
00079    /// of samples in the original block in order to load correctly.
00080    SeqBlockSummary(SeqBlockMetadata *metadata);
00081 
00082    void Write(SeqBlockMetadata *metadata);
00083 
00084    static void Get256(SeqBlockMetadata *md, int start, int len,
00085                FloatBuffer& min, FloatBuffer& max, FloatBuffer& sumSq);
00086    static void Get64k(SeqBlockMetadata *md, int start, int len,
00087                FloatBuffer& min, FloatBuffer& max, FloatBuffer& sumSq);
00088 
00089    int         m256Len;
00090    int         m64kLen;
00091    FloatBuffer m256Min;
00092    FloatBuffer m256Max;
00093    FloatBuffer m256SumSq;
00094    FloatBuffer m64kMin;
00095    FloatBuffer m64kMax;
00096    FloatBuffer m64kSumSq;
00097    float       mMin;
00098    float       mMax;
00099    float       mSumSq;
00100 };

00102 /// Represents an immutable block of samples in a Sequence data structure.
00103 class SeqBlock : public virtual Storable {
00104  public:
00105    virtual ~SeqBlock() {}
00106 
00107    int GetLength() { return mLen; }
00108 
00109    /// Retrieves audio data from this SeqBlock
00110    virtual Buffer Get(int start = 0) = 0;
00111    /// Retrieves audio data from this SeqBlock
00112    virtual Buffer Get(int start, int len) = 0;
00113 
00114    virtual bool GetIfCached(Buffer &buf, int start = 0) = 0;
00115    virtual bool GetIfCached(Buffer &buf, int start, int len) = 0;
00116 
00117    /// Gets extreme values for the whole block (these do not go to disk for the data)
00118    virtual float GetMin() = 0;
00119    virtual float GetMax() = 0;
00120    virtual float GetSumSq() = 0;
00121 
00122    virtual SeqBlockSummary *GetSummary() = 0;
00123    virtual bool GetSummaryIfCached(SeqBlockSummary **summary) = 0;
00124 
00125    virtual void IncrementDataReadRequestCount() { }
00126    virtual void DecrementDataReadRequestCount() { }
00127    virtual void IncrementSummaryReadRequestCount() { }
00128    virtual void DecrementSummaryReadRequestCount() { }
00129 
00130 
00131    virtual int GetRAMBytesUsed() = 0;
00132    virtual int GetDiskBytesUsed() = 0;
00133 
00134    //virtual SeqBlock* LoadSeqBlock(Loader& loader) const = 0;
00135 
00136  protected:
00137    int      mLen;
00138 };
00139 
00140 class SeqSilentBlock : public SeqBlock {
00141  public:
00142    SeqSilentBlock(int len) { mLen = len; }
00143 
00144    ~SeqSilentBlock() {}
00145 
00146    Buffer Get(int start = 0) {
00147       return FloatBuffer(mLen-start);
00148    }
00149    Buffer Get(int start, int len) {
00150       return FloatBuffer(len);
00151    }
00152 
00153    float GetMin() { return 0; }
00154    float GetMax() { return 0; }
00155    float GetSumSq() { return 0; }
00156 
00157    bool GetIfCached(Buffer &buf, int start = 0) { Get(start); return true; }
00158    bool GetIfCached(Buffer &buf, int start, int len) { Get(start, len); return true; }
00159 
00160    SeqBlockSummary *GetSummary() { return new SeqBlockSummary(FloatBuffer(mLen)); }  // TODO  memory leak!!
00161    bool GetSummaryIfCached(SeqBlockSummary **summary) { *summary = new SeqBlockSummary(FloatBuffer(mLen)); return true; }
00162 
00163    int GetRAMBytesUsed() { return sizeof(*this); }
00164    int GetDiskBytesUsed() { return 0; }
00165 
00166    void Store(Storer& storer);
00167 };
